methods.name: set_governor
methods.desc: sets the governor of the contract, may only be called by the current governor

methods.name: bootstrap

args.name: seed
args.desc: Initial Payment transaction to the app account so it can opt in to assets and create pool token.

args.name: a_asset
args.desc: One of the two assets this pool should allow swapping between.

args.name: b_asset
args.desc: The other of the two assets this pool should allow swapping between.

returns.desc: The asset id of the pool token created.

methods.desc:
bootstraps the contract by opting into the assets and creating the pool token.
Note this method will fail if it is attempted more than once on the same contract since the assets and pool token application state values are marked as static and cannot be overridden.

methods.name: mint

args.name: a_xfer
args.desc: Asset Transfer Transaction of asset A as a deposit to the pool in exchange for pool tokens.

args.name: b_xfer
args.desc: Asset Transfer Transaction of asset B as a deposit to the pool in exchange for pool tokens.

args.name: pool_asset
args.desc: The asset ID of the pool token so that we may distribute it.

args.name: a_asset
args.desc: The asset ID of the Asset A so that we may inspect our balance.

args.name: b_asset
args.desc: The asset ID of the Asset B so that we may inspect our balance.

methods.desc:
mint pool tokens given some amount of asset A and asset B.
Given some amount of Asset A and Asset B in the transfers, mint some number of pool tokens commensurate with the pools current balance and circulating supply of pool tokens.

methods.name: burn

args.name: pool_xfer
args.desc: Asset Transfer Transaction of the pool token for the amount the sender wishes to redeem

args.name: pool_asset
args.desc: Asset ID of the pool token so we may inspect balance.

args.name: a_asset
args.desc: Asset ID of Asset A so we may inspect balance and distribute it

args.name: b_asset
args.desc: Asset ID of Asset B so we may inspect balance and distribute it

methods.desc: burn pool tokens to get back some amount of asset A and asset B

methods.name: swap

args.name: swap_xfer
args.desc: Asset Transfer Transaction of either Asset A or Asset B

args.name: a_asset
args.desc: Asset ID of asset A so we may inspect balance and possibly transfer it

args.name: b_asset
args.desc: Asset ID of asset B so we may inspect balance and possibly transfer it

methods.desc: Swap some amount of either asset A or asset B for the other
